Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cell (RSOC) has attracted significant attention due to its multifunctionalities for energy conversion and storage.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This device works as a fuel cell (FC) or an electrolyzer cell (EC) with superior efficiency.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, its dynamic response is complex and may cause a large overshoot of current operated in reversible cell mode, which impairs the long-term stability of RSOC.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Although several works report the overshoot phenomenon, the mechanism and effects on cell performance are still unclear so far.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In this work, we build a 3D dynamic planar RSOC model to investigate the detailed behavior of overshoot.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The results show that the overshoot of current for RSOC can be caused under switching mode conditions.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Especially a larger overshoot of current can be observed within switching mode from EC to FC.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The overshoot of current is mainly caused by the load change, slower gas diffusion, and differentiated temperature distribution in RSOC.
Titulo: Dynamic analysis of current overshoots in reversible solid oxide cells
